projects.title: Mental Health Questionnaire
projects.description: The most impactful project I have worked on. I used JavaScript, HTML and CSS to build a website that allows users to fill out a questionnaire concering mental health topics that would help a user better understand the symptoms they are feeling which could lead to a more accurate diagonstics of these symptoms.

projects.title: Gallary Of Horns
projects.description: Gallary Of Horns is a website that allows users to view different horned beasts in one place with the ability to filter the results by the number of horns!
